1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Matching procedure.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Match
6  ( -- * Match
7    GeneralMatch,
8    CharMatch,
9    MatchResult,
10    matchExpr,
11    matchBundle,
12  ) where
13
14import Prelude hiding (seq)
15
16import qualified Data.Map.Strict                   as Ms
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Fn       as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Bundle    as T
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr      as T
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax    as T
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator  as T
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Para      as T
24
25-- | Function from input sequence to match result.
26--   When unmatched, 'Nothing' is returned.
27type GeneralMatch as a = as -> Maybe (MatchResult as a)
28
29-- | Character sequence version of 'GeneralMatch'.
30type CharMatch t = GeneralMatch t Char
31
32-- | Main and submatches.
33type MatchResult as a = (as, [T.Submatch as a])
34
35-- | Apply match expression to input sequence.
36matchExpr :: (O.List as a, Show a) => T.Expr as a -> GeneralMatch as a
37matchExpr e = matchBundle $ T.bundle [("start", e)]
38
39-- | Apply expression bundle to input sequence.
40matchBundle :: (O.List as a, Show a) => T.Bundle as a -> GeneralMatch as a
41matchBundle es s =
42    do result <- match $ T.createPara es s
43       Just $ matchResult result
44
45-- | Extract match result from parameter.
46matchResult :: (O.List as a) => T.Para as a -> MatchResult as a
47matchResult result = (mainMatch result, subMatches result)
48
49-- | Extract matched text.
50mainMatch :: (O.List as a) => T.Para as a -> as
51mainMatch = O.reverse . T.paraRawOutput
52
53-- | Extract submatches.
54subMatches :: T.Para as a -> [T.Submatch as a]
55subMatches = O.reverse . T.paraRawSubs
56
57-- | Match procedure.
58match :: (O.List as a, Show a) => T.Para as a -> Maybe (T.Para as a)
59match pa@T.Para { T.paraBundle    = bundle
60                , T.paraGather    = gather
61                , T.paraExpr      = expr
62                , T.paraPos       = pos
63                , T.paraInput     = s
64                , T.paraPrev      = prev
65                , T.paraRawOutput = o } = result
66    where
67      result = case expr of
68                 T.ERec  r -> rec r
69                 T.EBase b -> base b
70
71      para ? e = match $ para { T.paraExpr = e }
72
73      -- ----------------------  recursive
74
75      rec (T.EOr [])        = Nothing
76      rec (T.EOr (e:es))    = case pa ? e of
77                                Nothing  -> pa ? T.or es
78                                Just pa' -> Just pa'
79
80      rec (T.ESeq [])       = Just pa
81      rec (T.ESeq (e:es))   = do pa' <- pa ? e
82                                 pa' ? T.seq es
83
84      rec (T.EAnd [])       = Just pa
85      rec (T.EAnd (e:es))   = do pa' <- pa ? e
86                                 case all matched es of
87                                   True  -> Just pa'
88                                   False -> Nothing
89
90      rec (T.ENot e)        = case pa ? e of
91                                Nothing  -> Just pa
92                                Just _   -> Nothing
93
94      rec (T.ERep m e)      = rep m e
95      rec (T.ELast  e)      = let m s' = pa { T.paraInput = s' } ? e
96                              in firstJust (m <$> O.reverse (tails s))
97      rec (T.ESub n e)      = do pa' <- pa { T.paraRawOutput = O.empty } ? e
98                                 let o'   = T.paraRawOutput pa'
99                                     subs = T.paraRawSubs pa'
100                                 Just $ pa' { T.paraRawSubs   = (n, O.reverse o') : subs
101                                            , T.paraRawOutput = o' O.++ o }
102      rec (T.EAs (O.Fn _ f) e)
103                            = do pa' <- pa { T.paraRawOutput = O.empty } ? e
104                                 let o' = T.paraRawOutput pa'
105                                 Just $ pa' { T.paraRawOutput = O.reverse (f o') O.++ o }
106      rec (T.EGath b e)     = do pa' <- pa { T.paraGather = b } ? e
107                                 Just $ pa' { T.paraGather = gather }
108
109      matched e             = case pa ? e of
110                                 Nothing -> False
111                                 Just _  -> True
112
113      -- ----------------------  repetition
114
115      -- { E } ( A to )    = { E } ( A - 1 to )
116      -- { E } ( A to B )  = { E } ( A - 1 to B - 1 )
117
118      rep (T.Min a) e = case pa ? e of
119                          Nothing  -> lower a
120                          Just pa' -> next pa' $ T.min (a - 1) e
121
122      rep (T.MinMax a b) e
123          | b < a     = Nothing
124          | b <= 0    = Just pa
125          | otherwise = case pa ? e of
126                           Nothing  -> lower a
127                           Just pa' -> next pa' $ T.minMax (a - 1) (b - 1) e
128
129      lower a | a <= 0     = Just pa
130              | otherwise  = Nothing
131
132      next pa' e' | pos == T.paraPos pa'  = Just pa'   -- matched but not consumed
133                  | otherwise             = pa' ? e'
134
135      -- ----------------------  base
136
137      base (T.EElem (O.Fn _ f)) =
138          case O.cut s of
139            Just (x, s') | f x
140                 -> Just $ pa { T.paraPos       = pos + 1
141                              , T.paraInput     = s'
142                              , T.paraPrev      = Just x
143                              , T.paraRawOutput = output $ x O.<:> o }
144            _    -> Nothing
145
146      base (T.ESpan (O.Fn _ f)) =
147          do (w, s') <- f s
148             Just $ pa { T.paraPos       = pos + O.length w
149                       , T.paraInput     = s'
150                       , T.paraPrev      = case O.cut $ O.reverse w of
151                                             Just (x, _) -> Just x
152                                             Nothing     -> prev
153                       , T.paraRawOutput = output $ w O.++ o }
154
155      base (T.EInter (O.Fn2 _ f)) =
156          case O.cut s of
157            Just (r, _) | f prev (Just r)  -> Just pa
158            Nothing     | f prev (Nothing) -> Just pa
159            _                              -> Nothing
160
161      base (T.EChange n) =
162          do e' <- Ms.lookup n bundle
163             pa ? e'
164
165      base (T.EAlways b)       = when b
166      base T.EWhat             = Nothing
167
168      output o' | gather    = o'
169                | otherwise = o
170
171      when True   = Just pa
172      when False  = Nothing
173
174tails :: (O.List es e) => es -> [es]
175tails es = case O.cut es of
176             Just (_, es') -> es O.<:> tails es'
177             Nothing       -> [O.empty]
178
179firstJust :: [Maybe a] -> Maybe a
180firstJust []              = Nothing
181firstJust (Just x  : _)   = Just x
182firstJust (Nothing : xs ) = firstJust xs
183
